definitions.definition: A person living on adjacent or nearby land; a person situated adjacently or nearby; anything (of the same type of thing as the subject) in an adjacent or nearby position.
One who is near in sympathy or confidence.
Anything located directly adjacent to something else.
examples: The flood fill algorithm fills an area with colour by starting at one pixel and recursively visiting its neighbours .

main_definition: A person living on adjacent or nearby land; a person situated adjacently or nearby; anything (of the same type of thing as the subject) in an adjacent or nearby position.
secondary_definitions: One who is near in sympathy or confidence.
Anything located directly adjacent to something else.
